SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BlockListeners
 
BlockMaster
The main class that is used to initialize and start all tasks for the block master plugin
BlockMasterAPI
The API to interact with the BlockMaster plugin
BlockMasterGUI
Represents a GUI for the BlockMaster plugin to fetch and use custom blocks
BlockMasterGUIItems
Contains the methods to fetch the items that are supposed to be used in the BlockMaster GUI
BlockMasterLoadEvent
Triggers when everything is loaded within the plugin and the blocks are added to the block registry.
BlockRegistry
 
Command
The base class for all commands within the plugin
CommandAccess
The access levels of a command
CommandAdd
The command to add a block to the registry temporarily
CommandCore
Handles the core functionality of commands and their restrictive access
CommandPermission
The permissions required to execute a command
CommandReload
A command used to reload the configurations
CommandRemove
The command to remove a block to the registry temporarily
CommandTabCompleter
 
CommonNMSHandler
 
ConfigConfiguration
 
CustomBlock
The class that represents a custom block within BlockMaster
CustomBlockData
An object that stores the custom block data of a custom block
DirectionalBlock
A directional block to take into account block rotation
DirectionalCustomBlock
A directional custom block to take into account block rotation
Essentials
Common utilities used throughout the plugin
InteractableBlock
Represents the data of an interactable block
InventoryListeners
Handles all GUI interactions
ItemUtils
Contains item related utilities to aid and assist in item manipulation
Languages
A class to manage the translations and retrieving of messages
ListenerCore
Core class for handling listeners
Logger
A utility class intended to log messages easily to the Bukkit console
LoggingLevel
The different levels of logging that can be used in the plugin Contains the name and color of the logging level to use in the Bukkit console
NBTItem
A utility class intended to help add NBT data to items
NMSHandler
 
PluginConfiguration
A class that contains configurations and information regarding the plugin
